title: What is the Rio tennis schedule?
description: The 2025 Rio Open presented by Claro continues Tuesday with four courts in action at the Brazilian ATP 500. Among the stars in action will be top seed Alexander Zverev and #NextGenATP Brazilian Joao Fonseca, who won his first ATP Tour title on Sunday in Buenos Aires. View the full Rio de Janeiro Tuesday order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 18 FEBRUARY 2025 Quadra Guga Kuerten - start 16:30 [5] Sebastian Baez (ARG) vs Sumit Nagal (IND) Not Before 19:00 [1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) [SE] Joao Fonseca (BRA) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA) Quadra 1 - start 16:30 Corentin Moutet (FRA) vs [8] Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) [4] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs Hugo Gaston (FRA) [WC] Orlando Luz (BRA) / Felipe Meligeni Alves (BRA) vs [2] Ariel Behar (URU) / Robert Galloway (USA) Nicolas Barrientos (COL) / Gregoire Jacq (FRA) vs [WC] Marcelo Demoliner (BRA) / Fernando Romboli (BRA) Quadra 2 - start 16:30 Dusan Lajovic (SRB) vs Damir Dzumhur (BIH) Mariano Navone (ARG) vs Roberto Carballes Baena (ESP) [7] Pedro Martinez (ESP) vs [LL] Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) Quadra 4 - start 16:30 Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [Q] Hugo Dellien (BOL) [Q] Tomas Barrios Vera (CHI) vs [LL] Jaime Faria (POR) Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs [Q] Francisco Cabral (POR) / Jean-Julien Rojer (NED) Followed By After suitable rest - Luciano Darderi (ITA) / Mariano Navone (ARG) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) / Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Rio de Janeiro

Zverev, Fonseca in action on Day 2

February 18, 2025

Buda Mendes/Getty Images

The 2025 Rio Open presented by Claro concludes on 23 February. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Rio Open presented by Claro continues Tuesday with four courts in action at the Brazilian ATP 500.

Among the stars in action will be top seed Alexander Zverev and #NextGenATP Brazilian Joao Fonseca, who won his first ATP Tour title on Sunday in Buenos Aires.

View the full Rio de Janeiro Tuesday order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 18 FEBRUARY 2025

Quadra Guga Kuerten - start 16:30
[5] Sebastian Baez (ARG) vs Sumit Nagal (IND)

Not Before 19:00
[1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Yunchaokete Bu (CHN)
[SE] Joao Fonseca (BRA) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA)

Quadra 1 - start 16:30
Corentin Moutet (FRA) vs [8] Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG)
[4] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs Hugo Gaston (FRA)
[WC] Orlando Luz (BRA) / Felipe Meligeni Alves (BRA) vs [2] Ariel Behar (URU) / Robert Galloway (USA)
Nicolas Barrientos (COL) / Gregoire Jacq (FRA) vs [WC] Marcelo Demoliner (BRA) / Fernando Romboli (BRA)

Quadra 2 - start 16:30
Dusan Lajovic (SRB) vs Damir Dzumhur (BIH)
Mariano Navone (ARG) vs Roberto Carballes Baena (ESP)
[7] Pedro Martinez (ESP) vs [LL] Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG)

Quadra 4 - start 16:30
Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [Q] Hugo Dellien (BOL)
[Q] Tomas Barrios Vera (CHI) vs [LL] Jaime Faria (POR)
Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs [Q] Francisco Cabral (POR) / Jean-Julien Rojer (NED)

Followed By
After suitable rest - Luciano Darderi (ITA) / Mariano Navone (ARG) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) / Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG)
